Package com.github.dsvalerian.chip8

Class Screen

java.lang.Object
com.github.dsvalerian.chip8.Screen
public class Screen extends Object
Represents a Chip-8 screen. Handles setting and reading pixels.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int
    HEIGHT
    The height of the screen.
    static final int
    WIDTH
    The width of the screen.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    clearScreen()
    Deactivate every pixel in the screen.
    void
    print()
    Prints the screen's contents to System.out, where a '0' represents an active pixel and a '.' represents an inactive pixel.
    int
    readPixel(int x, int y)
     
    void
    setPixel(int x, int y, int active)
    Set a pixel at (x, y) to either active or inactive.

  • Constructor Details

    • Screen

      public Screen()

  • Method Details

    • setPixel

      public void setPixel(int x, int y, int active)
      Set a pixel at (x, y) to either active or inactive.
      Parameters:
      x - The column in the screen.
      y - The row in the screen.
      active - 1 or 0 for the pixel at (x, y) to be active or inactive.

    • readPixel

      public int readPixel(int x, int y)
      Parameters:
      x - The column in the screen.
      y - The row in the screen.
      Returns:
      1 if the pixel at (x, y) is active, 0 otherwise.

    • clearScreen

      public void clearScreen()
      Deactivate every pixel in the screen.

    • print

      public void print()
      Prints the screen's contents to System.out, where a '0' represents an active pixel and a '.' represents an inactive pixel.
